timeline.message:
Send status logs to the console not the file.
Improve logging at startup around source of genesis state.

Request block data in the order they will be required (not reverse order) so we start processing deposits sooner.
Provide status logs for each whole percentage increase in the number of registered validators.
Ignore min genesis time block if we have already loaded genesis.

timeline.author: cemozerr

timeline.bodyText: What's is the reasoning behind getting all the status logs in one place? It seems similar to having all constants in one file, which we seem to not want to be doing going forward.
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: It wasn't my idea.  At the moment it's a pretty small set so I can live with it but I'm not a huge fan of the approach.
replies.author: ajsutton
